alert.note: Alert for Mariposa Madera Foothills; Mariposa-Madera Lower Sierra; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:51AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MARIPOSA...WEST CENTRAL MADERA AND EAST CENTRAL MERCED COUNTIES THROUGH 615 AM PDT... At 551 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Chowchilla, or 10 miles southeast of Merced, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Chowchilla, Bootjack, Mariposa, Planada, Catheys Valley, and Le Grand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mariposa Madera Foothills; Mariposa-Madera Lower Sierra; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling
